entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Run coreclr tests on release for rolling builds #69465
  • MAUI+Android: Error when disposing HttpResponseMessage #69464
    6.0.x
  • CoreCLR_Shutdown and MetaDataGetDispenser Hang #69462
    7.0.0
  • runtime references some old packages that are no longer produced #69461
  • Some MonoTargetsTasks project references are not removed during source build #69460
  • xharness test failures when running WASM build tests locally #69457
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection fails to find the new version of the LDAP library on Ubuntu 22.04 #69456
  • Official build failed on linux-musl-arm64 due to NRE in crossgen2 #69454
  • Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration.csproj and LibraryImportGenerator.csproj have hard-coded RunAnalyzers setting #69450
  • SpecialFolder.ApplicationData is blank inside of an Alpine docker container #69449
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator adds DotNetCliToolReference to project #69435
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.UseCallback_BadCertificate_ExpectedPolicyErrors(uri: wrong.host.badssl.com) #69432
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Get.GetDateTime #69447
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BigInteger #69446
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Json.Document.Tests.Perf_EnumerateArray #69445
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/11/2022 9:09:01 PM #69444
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Encodings.Web.Tests.Perf_Encoders #69443
  • MemoryCache PostEvictionCallback unexpectedly using the wrong ILogger scope #69428
  • Hot Reload breaks `MethodInfo` equality #69427
  • Vector test failures on tvos on the rolling build #1774196 #69424
  • The memory usage of the Aspnetcore program in the container is very low, and the gc is too aggressive and affects the performance #69423
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add a RequiredElement() method to XContainer #69420
  • runtime-extra-platforms build break in Android in pal_uid.c due to getgrgid_r #69419
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: improved API to find succeeded top level alternation groups. #69415

Closed

  • System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch fails to report correct elapsed time #65321
    7.0.0
  • NRE in System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventPipePayloadDecoder if both GC + Threading event keywords are enabled #65630
    7.0.0
  • Getting command line via Diagnostic IPC APIs doesn't work properly in .NET 6 #64270
    7.0.0
  • jitdump output not accepted by ARM streamline #62456
    7.0.0
  • ReadAtLeastAsync(0) has a surprising behavior #67155
  • CLRJit Access Violation on when attempting to run Windows ARM64 app #69222
    7.0.0
  • Program running memory is higher and higher, GC is not big, working set memory is large #50758
    7.0.0
  • Apple Silicon system generated cores produce warnings #50606
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/VectorABI/VectorMgdMgdStatic_r/VectorMgdMgdStatic_r.sh #68530
    7.0.0
  • Expression interpreter - Reflection calls could be made cheaper #15556
    Future
  • Update NativeAOT Invoke exception handling #69336
  • Invoking delegate with null argument not working as expected. #67354
    7.0.0
  • TimeZoneNotFoundException on Alpine-Linux when looking for Windows-Timezone #69438
  • MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew on macOS throws System.IO.PathTooLongException #63240
    7.0.0
  • Use R2RDump to validate that the set of methods compiled with CG2 matches CG1 #50124
    7.0.0
  • Use ETW to verify that runtime execution runs the same R2R methods for CG1 vs. CG2 #50125
    7.0.0
  • Bitmap create new size as white image #67643
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support ref fields in System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.BlobEncoder #68309
    7.0.0
  • discrepancy between TcpClient constructor and Connect method #67879
    Future
  • WebSockets: Authentication of the HTTPS connection timed out #68399
  • Memory leak in System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream #69411
  • GetMemberWithSameMetadataDefinitionAs returns incorrect declaring type #67533
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json fails to deserialize into a model with an ImmutableList property. #69417
  • LINQ performance: `Count` is twice slower than `Where.Count` #69405
  • System.Reflection.Metadata cannot be used in applications that are "culture-invariant" but need to work with assemblies that specify a culture #69422
  • Interop source generator should respect sign of the requested type for bool marshalling #69147
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Rfc3279DerSequence to get the signature in the right format #69463
    area-System.Security
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Ensure the shared framework build uses the generated runtime.json #69455
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Handle multiple incoming connection at the beginning of Http3LoopbackConnection use #69453
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Do not automatically mark Stephen Toub as the issue triager or PR champion #69452
    area-Meta
  • Fix tracking for if a type has auto-layout fields for the managed type system. #69451
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Spanify some Windows X.509 PAL and improve formatting. #69448
    area-System.Security
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Fix SystemNative_SendFile on iOS/tvOS devices #69436
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.UseCallback_BadCertificate_ExpectedPolicyErrors(uri: wrong.host.badssl.com) #69433
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use span to pass type modifiers in RuntimeTypeHandle.GetTypeHelper #69425
    community-contribution
  • Move dead code removal in lower after last updategraph #69421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • pool async state in SslStream #69418
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Draft] Fix hard link creation in tar tests in Android, iOS, tvOS #69416
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Add comment about PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync(0) #69217
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [mono] Fix a crash during stack trace construction if a this object i… #69292
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • UOH alloc fix for hardlimit #69345
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Arm64: Make unroll code for cpblk non-interruptible #69202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reuse the throw away buffer in ZipHelper #69439
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • #69424 disabled failing equals nan tests on tvos #69429
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix executable memory reservation when range is not requested #69430
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Wasm conditional audit + remove CompileFunction #69283
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Wrap exceptions from array constructors in TargetInvocationException #69440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce max shared memory object name length #68541
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Revert "Address some System.Formats.Tar TODOs (infra and syscalls)" #69442
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm][debugger] Extract the main run loop from DevToolsClient, and #69219
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add clang 14 to known compiler versions. #69249
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Alpine 3.16 #68925
    area-Meta
  • Support ref fields in `System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.BlobEncoder`. #69378
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • remove duplicate Connect logic from TcpClient #67951
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Make json source generation cancellable #69332
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix for GetMemberWithSameMetadataDefinitionAs #69284
    area-System.Reflection
  • [QUIC] Fixed work with QUIC_BUFFER #69351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add some assertions to Stream.Read in System.Text.Encoding.CodePages #69414
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Optimize ManifestResourceStream.Read(Span<byte>) #69412
    area-System.Reflection
  • Allow the inliner to substitute for small arguments #69068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use intrinsic for genLog2() #69333
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address some System.Formats.Tar TODOs (infra and syscalls) #69107
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Delete ClrDirectoryEnumerator #69400
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for marshalling signed/unsigned boolean types. #69402
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup some X509 PAL allocations #69408
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • Adding Int128 and UInt128 with a base software implementation #69204
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Stream ReadAtLeast and ReadExactly #69272
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix NRE in EmitCall for DynamicMethod #69027
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] First attempt at a wasm app host #68696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter #68823
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • ARM64 - Add GT_CHK_DIV_BY_ZERO #69170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix GetContentAsync_ErrorStatusCode_ExpectedExceptionThrown test #69228
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • ARM64 - Do not emit possible DIV_BY_ZERO/OVERFLOW exception blocks for non-zero/non-(negative one) constants #68945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run host tests with dotnet test and enable crash/hang dumps #69340
    area-Host
  • Fix several regex loop issues #69413
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fix some scaling issues with the global queue in the thread pool #69386
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono, needs-author-action
  • Add markdown Readme for System.Text.Json #69015
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [monoapi] Add MONO_IMAGE_NOT_SUPPORTED to MonoImageOpenStatus #69062
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Allow source generation for classes with ignored init-only props #69327
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • WIP: [Mono] Fix 4244 warnings. #69236
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm-ep] Minimal diagnostic tracing configuration and sample #69158
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Iterative generic math changes to match API review #69391
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add more char.Is* helpers for common ASCII sets #69318
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix runtime-llvm pipeline #68495
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Added null safety on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix r4 r8 numbers #66979
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Apply MaxResponseHeadersLength limit to trailing headers #69250
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect description when update dotnet tool with prerelease version #25486
  • .NET 6.0.5 Patch - SDK Update necessary? #25478

Closed

  • Fix package signature verification when installing workloads. #25377
    6.0.3xx
  • Workload feature band fallback doesn't work with workload update #23403
    6.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • document long paths-related error message when building on windows #25490
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clear DOTNET_ROOT_arch environment variable #25480
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #25479
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.0 to the current framework #25476
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Enable the 4.8.1 target in sdk style projects #25393
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
  • Remove duplicated PackageReference #25443
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25467
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1776107 #25346
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25403
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Support suppressing transitive framework reference downloads, and other changes #25358
  • add tests to cover the resolution of AnalysisLevel known-strings #25454
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update Test project TestAppEchoDotnetRoot to current framework #22784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22233
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.1 to the current framework #25350
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Calling ReplaceNode/ReplaceNodes on the Type specifier of a DeclarationPatternSyntax results in losing a space #61371
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharperrorlistnetcore.errorsafterclosingfile is flaky #61368
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharperrorlistnetcore.errorlist #61367
  • CSharpWrappingCodeRefactorProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #61362
    Backlog
  • Roslyn fails to take into account lifted operators' behavior resulting in false postivie nulalbility warnings #61361
  • Referencing Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeStyle in .NET Framework project needs Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Compilers which causes dependency to netstandard.dll #61360
  • Renaming moves focus to a different editor, doesn't rename #61357
    17.3
  • Braces need escaping in raw string interpolation on net472 #61355

Closed

  • Json classification appears to be broken with 'LSP classification' on. #61212
    17.3
  • Integration test failure: CSharpEncapsulateField #61128
  • error IDE0055 - seems inconsistent running in Devops #61042
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Allow services to be exported per language server #61002
  • Formatter requires two passes for comments in lambdas #60437
    Next
  • Source generator Is not found/executed #61365

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more telemetry for rename #61370
    Area-IDE
  • Use the correct span to rename after invoking extract-method manually. #61369
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] [Do not review] Try various changes to fix CI for #61351 #61363
    Area-IDE, Community
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61352
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • [LSP] Add JSON semantic token classifications #61231
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move Spellcheck capabilities to be activated in all scenarios #61366
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • [LSP] Support LSP services associated with LSP server instances (with lifetimes that match). #61266
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Avoid caching indentation data that changes over time #61304
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Removed unintentional `WorkItem`s #61349
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61359
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61358
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61354
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61353
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Bump macos workload to RC3 #61250
    Area-IDE
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • ✨ Implement ImmutableSegmentedHashSet<T> #54719
    Area-Compilers
  • Better completions in generic constraints #61335
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add the fix all provider for fixing all naming violation to feature branch #59726
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce allocations in DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader.ReadToEnd #61351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE
  • Improve SyntaxNormalizer performance #50778
    Area-Compilers
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • WIP: Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add logging in RedisCache #41723
    Backlog
  • Allow endpoint filter factories to manipulate endpoint metadata #41722
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Trimming] Request Decompression Middleware #41721
  • GrpcTemplate is quarantined #41716
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [dotnet-watch] E2E tests for dotnet-watch #41713
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Server execption on publish after updating to .net 7 #41712
  • define an interface for HubConnectionContext for signalR #41709
  • RedirectRule not respecting configured scheme #41707
  • System.IO.DirectoryInfo doesn't work properly in client-side Blazor WebAssembly #41706
  • Filters that don't have any parameters shouldn't allocate an empty array #41705
    7.0-preview5
  • [Trimming] SignalR #41704
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Trimming] Identity #41703
  • Add IP range support to AllowedHosts #41702

Closed

  • [Minimal API] Validation errors are absent in response #41686
  • SignalR HubConnectionBuilder doesn't pass Client Certificate to server. #41653
  • Client generated code, from OpenAPI, could not bind route parameter of a Minimal Endpoint when route pattern's parameter and delegate's parameter case does not match #41422
    7.0-preview5
  • In C# Client HubConnection.Connected event needed #41717
  • OpenApiGenerator throws ArgumentException if duplicate response model present for a status code #41622
    7.0-preview5
  • Apparent memory leak passing large data to javascript to download via link. #41691
  • Blazor Wasm loading iOS mobile in the middle of page #41652

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Trimming.md #41720
  • Task and ValueTask are not covariant #41719
  • Add AppOfflineDroppedWhileSiteIsDown_SiteReturns503_InProcess to test retry list #41718
  • Add script to mirror one internal branch to another #41715
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Favor parameter name in route pattern when available #41701
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview5
  • Update SDK #41697
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Handle multiple response annotations for the same status code in OpenApi #41699
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview5
  • Update ApiExplorer area owners #41714
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fall back to using old command when GetServer isn't supported #41649
    area-runtime
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Tratcher/h2ws #41558
    area-runtime
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] Update some npm deps #41270
    area-signalr
  • Enable trim analyzer #41683
    area-infrastructure
  • Add trimming annotations to DotNetObjectReference #41610
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-jsinterop
  • Adding API convention to contribute to Endpoint Metadata #41635
    area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Update docs: make required version of LLDB clear #3078
    8.0.0
  • Debugging a self-contained app locks its mscordbi.dll #3081
    7.0.0
  • Add dotnet trace profile to enable collecting counters with the trace #3069
    7.0.0
  • Make EventPipe sample profile frequency configurable #3061
    7.0.0
  • EventPipe sample profile: missing thread state information #3060
    7.0.0
  • Dotnet-trace in container does not collect full stack information #3051
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-counters renders incorrectly in certain situations #3036
    7.0.0
  • DiagnosticSource and DiagnosticListener #3029
    7.0.0
  • Add support of standard streams redirection in dbgshim #3004
    7.0.0
  • Run tests with dotnet trace #2989
    7.0.0
  • Visual Studio stacks elide some CLR frames in mixed mode #2982
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-stack should filter out its immediate parent `dotnet` process if any #2977
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-counter console output corruption on resize #2934
    7.0.0
  • dotnet.wasm diagnostics tools (load browser heap-snapshot to dotnet-dump analyze?) #2884
    7.0.0
  • Expose the process ThreadCount in dotnet-counters #2882
    7.0.0
  • How to halt dotnet-trace in an automated context (CI job) #2881
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-gcdump collect: System.Exception: Read past end of stream #2841
    7.0.0
  • sos commands `eestack` & `dumpstack` crashed on Debian10-arm32 with .net 7.0 #2947
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SOS to show thread pool work items from new queues #3080
    7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Text inside ContentView doesn't update when using an async command on iOS #7281
  • Running app on Android fine but immediately exits on Windows : "Layout cycle detected. Layout could not complete." #7280
  • .NET MAUI source view showing errors - lots of them! #7279
  • Use of ContentPresenter in a ControlTemplate will cause app to exit on Windows but not Android #7278
  • Dispose() on Razor component not called on application close (Blazor .MAUI Windows app) #7277
  • .Net Maui Multiple Listview errors and program crash on VS2022 (64-bit) Preview Version 17.3.0 Preview 1.0 #7276
  • Resetting Window Page does not update UI #7275
  • MAUI Application.Current.MainPage (17.3.0) = new Shell causes title bar to go translucent #7274
  • Warning in MAUI when referencing a project with GenerateDocumentationFile true #7272
  • ScrollView as child layout not working scrolling #7271
  • Not able to create Msix file for an application with a custom library referred directly #7268
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] CollectionView Horizontal layout using strings not rendering #7264
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] CollectionView Spacing not working using horizontal grid layout #7263
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] CollectionView EmptyView string not working #7262
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] Brushes not working in Frame #7261
  • [MacCatalyst] [Scenario Day] Crash using Shell #7260
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Request] Allow self-registration of handlers, etc. #7258
    .NET 7
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] Application.Current.Quit not working #7255
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] ListView has performance issues #7254
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] CarouselView freeze trying to use Spacing #7253
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] Navigating from SearchHandler get a blank page #7252
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] Wrong selection in list inside Shell #7251
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] Vertical CollectionView cannot scroll #7250
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] CarouselView wrong behavior of snap points using vertical layout #7249
  • Shell.TabBarIsVisible = "False" not working on WinUI #7246
    6.0.300-servicing
  • TranslateTo animation not working properly under iOS #7244
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Picker control does not respect size imposed by parent. #7243
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Adaptive Trigger on StackLayout crashes Windows. #7242

Closed

  • [IOS] InputTransparency always cascaded to Children even when CascadeInputTransparent= false #6574

entry.content:
Issues

Created

    7.0.0
  • Using custom entity Id type results in blocking select query without any error #28040

Closed

  • Any way to set default `JsonSerializerOptions`? #27991
  • Read-only transaction support #28003
  • Nesting `DbContext` scopes breaks filtering semantics on queries on the outer context #28025

  • Migrations SQL script (npgsql) truncates some identifiers to 64 not 63 characters #27862

Updated
